event.title: Pre-FrOSCon FSFE Community Meetup in Bonn, Germany

body.p:
This weekend is FrOSCon weekend! So the local FSFE Community in Bonn is hosting a get-together before the big event. We will have some visitors from far away (does Berlin count as far away?).
This is also an opportunity if you can't make it to FrOSCon but still want to hang out. You are welcome either way!
See you from 19.00 at Caf√© Bistro Pendel - reservation under Liv Dywan in case you can't find us
